question:
Consider the following statements about the National Dairy Plan (NDP) Phase-I:
  1. It is a Central Sector Scheme being implemented by the National Dairy Development Board (NDDB)
  2. The scheme is funded by the World Bank
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The National Dairy Plan (NDP) Phase-I is a Central Sector Scheme being implemented by the National Dairy Development Board (NDDB). <u>Second statement is also correct</u>. The National Dairy Plan has been envisaged with a fifteen-year horizon. The phase-I of the NDP is financed largely by the World Bank and is implemented for a period of 6 years. The scheme aims to increase the productivity of milch animals and thereby milk productivity.
